thread.title: BRIEF-Timken Q4 Adj SHR $0.68 Excluding Items

title: BRIEF-Timken Q4 Adj SHR $0.68 Excluding Items
text:
February 7, 2018 / 12:29 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Timken Q4 Adj SHR $0.68 Excluding Items Reuters Staff 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Timken Co: 
* TIMKEN REPORTS STRONG FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 RESULTS; EXPECTS CONTINUED GROWTH IN 2018 * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.68 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.37 * Q4 SALES ROSE 18.8 PERCENT TO $778 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.20 TO $3.30 * SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.05 TO $3.15 * REPORTS Q4 SALES $778 MILLION * REPORTS Q4 SALES UP 19 PERCENT 
* COMPANY EXPECTS 2018 REVENUE TO BE UP APPROXIMATELY 9 TO 10 PERCENT IN TOTAL VERSUS 2017 
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.68, REVENUE VIEW $768.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.28, REVENUE VIEW $3.27 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* TIMKEN - HIGHER INCOME TAX EXPENSE IN QUARTER WAS DRIVEN BY ONE-TIME CHARGES OF $35.3 MILLION RECORDED DUE TO ENACTMENT OF TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT OF 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
